comments.raw_text:
http://mozillalabs.com/projects

[found via a google search for "mozilla labs", click on projects]

Clicking on the gold shield icon for "Gaming" will redirect to a valid web page:
    http://mozillalabs.com/gaming/

Clicking the text link "Gaming" beneath the icon will produce a 404 error:
    http://mozillalabs.com/projects/www.mozillalabs.com/gaming
comments.author: joey@mozilla.com
